attributes.additional_details:
It has come to light that most of the UK's child sex offenders still have a right to be around children. This including going to fair grounds, parks, amusment parks, etc.

The reality of it is that if a know child sex offender is going to these types of places clearly shows their intention to re-offend.

The only way to prevent them re-offending is to put legal restrictions in place preventing them from entering any place intended for under 18's and preventing them from being in the company of a minor without supervision from the childs parents/guardian.

Please help up take this to the top and make our voices heard.
